Name: Shoot Covid-19 | 消灭新冠肺炎
About the game: The novel coronavirus is spreading all over the world. Facing this invisible enemy, all mankind should join hands and fight together. To fight in the front line of medical workers, to express the highest respect. Pay tribute to all the people who have contributed to the fight against the epidemic. At this time, let's stay at home and contribute to the whole human race. Let's try our covid-19 shooting game. In the game, you need to clear all kinds of monsters infected by pneumonia virus in the infirmary, and finally eliminate all the viruses to reach the destination. Pick up your weapon, a universal disinfection gun, will block your progress of the monsters killed, into the next transfer point. You will face all kinds of monsters, don't mention it. Kill them all and win the final victory. Pay attention to protect yourself, the monster is very fierce, you only have a small amount of blood, do not let the monster besiege you! Games include: more than 5 kinds of monsters a wide range of free shuttle scenes three exciting music Here! Hope we can finally defeat the virus! Long live the great unity of the people of the world!
